results.definition: (baseball) a turn trying to get a hit
examples: he was at bat when it happened
he got four hits in four at-bats

results.definition: nocturnal mouselike mammal with forelimbs modified to form membranous wings and anatomical adaptations for echolocation by which they navigate
beat thoroughly and conclusively in a competition or fight
the club used in playing cricket
examples: a cricket bat has a narrow handle and a broad flat end for hitting

results.definition: a small racket with a long handle used for playing squash
a club used for hitting a ball in various games

examples: Jones bats first, followed by Martinez

results.definition: strike with, or as if with a baseball bat
